label.text:
$fffThe TrackMania Web Services API wants to redirect you to the Player Page for authentication, which cannot be opened as a Manialink. There are two possible ways to resolve this:
1. Open $f80$lhome.trackmania.com$l$fff or $f80$ldevelopers.trackmania.com$l$fff in your web browser, log in, and then try the Manialink again.
2. Click $f80$l[%URL1%]here$l$fff to open the Player Page in your web browser - after logging in, copy the resulting URL and paste it in-game as if it were a regular Manialink.
Alternatively, if you believe this was a mistake, you can try opening the Player Page link directly as a Manialink instead.
